positionTitle: Full Stack Developer and UI Engineer
description: We’re looking for a Full Stack Developer and UI Engineer to develop the user experience and backend design of the next generation of robotics
We’re looking for a Business Development Associate to work closely with the CEO on all business development aspects of Greenfinn Technologies.
We’re looking for a Mechanical Design Engineer to undertake applied robotics and help us to design advanced technologies

We’re are seeking Machine Learning Researchers that are interested in building perception and adaptive control systems that improve the performance, reliability, and generalizability of robot behaviors.
